title: Pickups + Reload SFX: Weapons, Ammo, Healthpacks etc..
description: The pickup sound effects packs features 89 sounds for objects and items pickups: weapons, ammo, powerups, healthpacks, boosters, upgrades, credits, damage, invincibility, invisibility, fire rate and more! Guns reload + Perfect for modern / sci-fi FPS, TPS
longDescription:
Audio demo (with a background music behind) here: Youtube demo video

The pickup sound effects packs features 89 sounds (including variations) for objects and items pickups: weapons, ammo, healthpacks, boosters, upgrades, credits, damage, invincibility, invisibility, fire rate, gun reload and more!


The pickup sound effects packs features 89 sounds for objects and items pickups: weapons, ammo, healthpacks, boosters, upgrades, credits, damage, invincibility, invisibility, fire rate and more! Guns reload + Perfect for modern and sci-fi FPS, TPS


Don't hesitate to check my other sound effects here: IndieGameModels Store

Do you want to optimize the performance of your game? Check this awesome plugin! Dynamic Lighting Portal System (+30 to 60% FPS increase)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Booster (damage, fire rate, invincibility etc..) x12
  • Credits x6
  • Healthpacks x5
  • Misc x14
  • Upgrades x12
  • Ammo x22
  • Weapons x18

Number of Audio tracks: 89

Number of Audio Cues: 89

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1khz 16bit MONO Wav

Does music\audio loop: NO

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
